title: Language Enhancement Workshop in Blended and Virtual Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate language proficiency and understanding of basic terminology in professional fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Workshop Aiming to Improve Language Skills and Professional Practice Through Project-Based Learning in Hybrid and Virtual Settings: Participants Include Learners from Diverse Backgrounds (Medical/Legal/Technical), with Digital Device-Based Collaboration Essential

learning_goals: Participants can improve professional writing and translation skills by over 30% in blended and virtual learning environments.
Participants can independently write and present reports using specialized terminology in team projects developed via Problem-Based Learning (PBL).
Participants can efficiently manage and share language tasks using digital tools (e.g., collaboration platforms, translation software).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
